member.summary: Describes a brokered service that implements . Used to register the brokered service with

member.summary: The moniker that can be used to request a proxy of the source.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.ChunkSourceDescriptor.BatchIdentityTypes
member.summary: Names of types that this provider may produce.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.ChunkSourceDescriptor.ChunkTypes
member.summary: Names of chunk types that this provider may produce.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.ChunkSourceDescriptor.LazyInitialization
member.summary: Gets a flag describing whether the chunk source initializes lazily. File-based chunk sources will not be activated until a file that it targets is requested for indexing.

list.item: File-based chunk sources must be lazily initialized, and will only be activated if there's a request matching .
Non-file based chunk sources that lazily initialize will be initialized when any non-file request is seen. This behavior may be subject to change.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.ChunkSourceDescriptor.Experimental
member.summary: Gets a flag describing whether the chunk source is experimental. Experimental chunk sources must be explicitly enabled by name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.ChunkSourceDescriptor.TargetFiles
member.summary: Gets information on the files that are targeted by the chunk source, if it does so. This property is optional.
member.remarks: This property should be left null if the chunk source does not target files. Chunk sources that target files will activate lazily in response to matching files being requested for indexing.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.ChunkSourceTargetFiles
member.summary: Represents a chunk source target file configuration used for matching a file to a file chunk source.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.ChunkSourceTargetFiles.Patterns
member.summary: Gets the s that will be used to determine if a file should be processed by the file chunk source.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.ChunkSourceTargetFiles.Priority
member.summary: Gets of the file chunk source used during the file matching process.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.ChunkSourceTargetFilesPattern
member.summary: Holds information on a pattern used to specify what potential target files the file chunk source should process.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.ChunkSourceTargetFilesPattern.Pattern
member.summary: Gets the pattern used for matching a file to a file chunk source.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.ChunkSourceTargetFilesPattern.PatternType
member.summary: Gets the used for matching a file to a file chunk source.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.ChunkSourceTargetFilesPatternType
member.summary: Specifies the type of pattern used for matching a file to a file chunk source.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.ChunkSourceTargetFilesPatternType.Extension
member.summary:
Represents that the pattern of the file chunk source is an extension and should be compared to the extension of a file (including the leading period) to determine a match, e.g., ".cs", ".cpp", etc.
An empty pattern associated with this type will match files without an extension, e.g., README, LICENSE, etc. Specifying a multipart extension, e.g., ".tar.gz", will not match any files. Matching for this pattern type is done from the last period to the end of the file name.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.ChunkSourceFileMatchingPriority
member.summary: Specifies the priority of the pattern used for resolving the file chunk source when a file matches multiple patterns.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.ChunkSourceFileMatchingPriority.None
member.summary: Represents that the pattern does not have any priority.
member.remarks: When a file matches multiple patterns, the chunk source could only be chosen if the other file sources have the same priority, but without any guarantee.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.ChunkSourceFileMatchingPriority.Low
member.summary: Represents that the pattern has low priority.
member.remarks: When a file matches multiple patterns, the chunk source will be chosen if the other file sources have lower priority. If other file sources have the same priority, the chunk source could be chosen, but without any guarantee.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.ChunkSourceFileMatchingPriority.High
member.summary: Represents that the pattern has high priority.
member.remarks: When a file matches multiple patterns, the chunk source will be chosen if the other file sources have lower priority. If another file source has the same priority, an exception will be thrown.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.ChunkTranslatorDescriptor

member.summary: A brokered service that produces es containing chunks, and sends them to the appropriate brokered service that's specified by the 's . Called as a result of calling .
Collects chunks from the current state and sends them to the .
member.param: Indexing operation this send is associated with.
Metadata of the index the chunks will be sent to.
member.returns: Task that completes when all chunks are provided.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.IChunkTranslator
member.summary: Brokered service responsible for storing domain-specific data in the RAG index, and retrieving it. Warning: Chunk translator interface is unstable and subject to change.
Translate domain-specific batches for generic storage, and sends the generic chunks to be stored. If the ChunkBatch already exists, it must be overwritten.

member.summary: Searches an index for a query. Results are translated into domain-specific chunks by the index's configured .

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.UpdateIndexOptions
member.summary: Parameters for an index update operation (). Will be passed to relevant s, which can change their behavior accordingly.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.UpdateIndexOptions.TargetIndex
member.summary: The ID of the index to update.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.UpdateIndexOptions.RecreateExistingBatches
member.summary: Whether batches that already exist in the index should be re-created by the . If off, the shouldn't query the , which may result in overall faster chunking in cases where we know that the chunks won't already exist (e.g. a new index).

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.UpdateIndexOptions.EnumerateWorkspaceFiles
member.summary: If set, and is null, files in the current workspace will be enumerated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.UpdateIndexOptions.RequestStream
member.summary: Optional stream of batches to produce. Signals to s that they should only produce matching chunk batches. File-based chunk sources must read this and only produce chunks for files that match the requested identities.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.UpdateIndexOptions.IgnorePatterns
member.summary: Optional list of patterns to be ignored by the . The specific usage of these patterns to exclude some s is defined by the implementation.
member.remarks: The suggested use for batches that map to files is to exclude any files with full paths matching any of these strings.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.UpdateIndexOptions.EnabledExperimentalChunkSources
member.summary: Optional list of 'experimental' chunk sources to enable. See .

member.summary: Point-in-time status information about an index.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.UnstableInternalApi.Indexing.ChunkIndexStatus.IsReadyForQueries
member.summary: Gets a value which indicates whether the index is ready to handle queries. Exposing this to WorkspaceScope allows it to make more informed decisions about when to try to rebuild the index, which is necessary because we don't currently have incremental updating. (AzDO #2021630)

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Copilot.TypelessMessagePackDescriptor.TypelessDescriptorMessagePackOptions
member.summary:
This options class is used to override LoadType to ensure type loads occur on the AssemblyLoadContext that loaded Copilot assemblies.
In case of ServiceHub and extensibility scenarios, this will be extensions load context which will be able to resolve assemblies deployed by the extension.
